message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable.  Given its unique benefits, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,350,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective, the value this product offers is truly unique and rare. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,275,000. I believe this reflects a fair compromise for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $1,275,000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,150,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
